body_html: I don't think it's worth giving up our name conventions just to improve these messages. We have torch.FloatTensor and torch.cuda.FloatTensor, so it seems logical that it should be torch.sparse.FloatTensor too.
body_text: I don't think it's worth giving up our name conventions just to improve these messages. We have torch.FloatTensor and torch.cuda.FloatTensor, so it seems logical that it should be torch.sparse.FloatTensor too.
body: I don't think it's worth giving up our name conventions just to improve these messages. We have `torch.FloatTensor` and `torch.cuda.FloatTensor`, so it seems logical that it should be `torch.sparse.FloatTensor` too.
